content.full_text: Envelope of Abraham Lincoln to John T. Scott, December 1
paragraphs: Envelope of Abraham Lincoln to John T. Scott, December 1

footnotes.text:
1Abraham Lincoln addressed this envelope, and he franked it by writing “Free” and signing
                  his name. The correspondence that this envelope contained has not been located.

structured_content.text: Envelope of Abraham Lincoln to John T. Scott, December [1847-1848]1
